pages.text: The Arthana is a special knife used by witches and warlocks to harvest special ingredients or for some rites. Very similar to a $(item)Golden Sword$() for several aspects, it improves upon it in a few others, such as durability.

pages.title: Harvesting Ingredients
pages.text: The main purpose of the dagger, is to collect special ingredients from some creatures, as it greatly increases the chance of dropping such ingredients when killing them. Typical examples are $(item)Tognue of Dogs$() and $(item)Wool of Bat$(), but also $(item)Skulls$() (except Wither Skeletons') and $(item)Spectral Dust$() from spectral beings. All changes further increase when the Arthana is enchanted.

pages.title: Other usages
pages.text: The Arthana is also one of the $(l:constructs/altar/altar)Altar$(/l) boosting items, and finds some usages also in $(l:)Circle Magic$(/l). When the Arthana is used as a $(item)foci$() in Circle Magic, it is not consumed.
